pageTitle: Human Rights at Home: Implementing Human Rights through Domestic Legal Systems panel | Center for Constitutional Rights
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {7101=What: Human Rights at Home: Implementing Human Rights through Domestic Legal Systems Where: Columbia Law School, Jerome Greene Annex When: Tuesday, April 2nd from 1:10-2:30 p.m. Who: Katie Gallagher of the Center for Constitutional Rights; Katrina Anderson, Center for Reproductive Rights; Yasmine Ergas, Institute for the Study of Human Rights at SIPA; Maria Foscarinis, National Law Center on Homelessness & Poverty; Moderated by Professor Risa Kaufman, 7401=Please join CCR Senior Staff Attorney Katie Gallagher for a panel discussion at The 39th Annual Wolfgang Friedmann Conference honoring the 2003 Nobel Prize Laureate Dr. Shirin Ebadi. Katie will speak on a panel immediately following a lunch discussion with Dr. Ebadi.}
